data.title: Houston, TX Downtown
data.meta_description: Morton's The Steakhouse is located in Downtown Houston. Join us for dinner featuring the best steak anywhere! Join us for happy hour at Bar 12-21!
data.meta_site_name: Morton's The Steakhouse | Chain of steak restaurants with locations in the United States and franchised abroad, founded in Chicago in 1978
data.text:
Your Table Is Waiting

Located in the heart of downtown Houston, the world's energy capital, Morton's provides an elegant oasis for the established and young professional business sector of downtown Houston. Opened in November of 2006 with a special event hosted by President George H.W. Bush, the approximately 8,000 square foot restaurant features a stunning main dining room with seating for 125, three private boardrooms that can accommodate up to 90 and seating for 40 in the modern and stylish Bar 12-21.

General Manager: Mark Rivera

Proper attire is required. View our dress code here.
